EN: The Town Center provides the foundation necessary to grow your city.
Allows building farms and lumbermills. Town center can hold a maximum of 700 crop, 700 wood, and 200 iron.
Enables building barracks and a university. Increases the maximum resources to 1100 crop, 1100 wood, and 300 iron.
Increases the maximum resources to 1600 crop, 1600 wood, and 500 iron.
Allows building foundries, trading posts, and stables. Increases the maximum resources to 2500 crop, 2500 wood, and 800 iron.

Enables the ability to train your laborers into military units and provides defensive structures.
Decreases training time by 5%. Allows converting the structure to a Barrack.

Allow the city's laborer to use wood to repair buildings after they have been damaged in combat.
Increases to a maximum of 10 laborers. One labor can repair up to 10 HP every 30 minutes. Each HP restored will cost 1 wood.

Enables upgrading calvary and heavy calvary.
Enables converting the stable into a workshop. Decreases unit training time by 5%.
Ability to train siege engines such as catapults and helepolis.
Allows researching technologies that improve your city in various ways.
Allows researching technologies that improve your city's military defense.
Allows researching technologies that improve your city's military offense.
Provides defense to nearby buildings during an attack.
Protects buildings within a 1 tile radius.
